The tool gets a robust gear housing made from die cast aluminium. This makes the tool durable and allows optimum heat dissipation for smooth functioning even during heavy use.

While drilling, the tool vibrates and tends to sway from the drilling point. To combat this inconvenience the tool comes with an auxiliary handle that lets you control the tool for an accurate drilling along with providing a safe user experience. There is no fretting even when the tool gets jammed during use as the Metabo S-automatic torque limiting clutch is there for rescue. productAttributes.productDescription: The BT-CD 10.8/1 Li cordless drill is a handy and a versatile tool, and provider of good service to DIY enthusiasts on screwdriving and light drilling jobs everywhere in the home, workshop and garage. The tool comes with a powerful lithium ion battery with capacity indicator for quick checking of the charge level at a glance. Operation of the BT-CD 10.8/1 Li can be effectively adapted to the requirements of the job in hand using the reversing facility, electronic speed control and adjustable torque. The Quick Stop function prevents unwanted continued running after the operating switch is released. An LED light provides optimum illumination of the work area. A practical magnetic screw holder on the tool acts as your third hand, and the soft grip ensures safe, comfortable handling. The housing surface is soft-painted to provide a particularly good grip. A safety loop prevents the tool from being dropped.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Well, you have bought a brand new car. You love the shine on it and the fact that your friends admire it. Now, how do you maintain this shine and keep your car looking brand new?

You can either take the car to a servicing centre or make a one-time investment and bring home this car polisher. With this vehicle polisher you can work the magic by yourself and retain the show car finish on your vehicle.

Ergonomically designed for comfortable working and efficient results, the Makita PW5001C comes with rubberized soft grip for better control. Remove dirt, swirl marks, scratches and other paint defects on your car, with this tool. Maintaining the smoothness on your car can be achieved by levelling or flattening the paint on its surface with the abrasives of the tool.

For optimum use, the tool comes with variable speed control so that you can adjust the speed according to the work. Every channel of the polishing pad is evenly dampened by the three water supply holes to protect the tool from overheating and getting clogged with dust.
productAttributes.title: Makita PW5001C Vehicle Polisher 5 inch

offers.title: Exclusively for you:- Rs100 EXTRA OFF on shopping for 2 or more units from seller WS Retail on select products only. Valid till 26th Jan 2015. See final price at cart.

productAttributes.productDescription:
If driving a car that looks shiny and brand new every day is what you desire, then this vehicle polisher from Makita might just be the tool you need to possess. With a one-time investment you can do away with professional help to maintain the sparkle and smoothness of your car. Polishing and detailing your car is no more confined to a servicing centre with this easy-to-use vehicle polisher.

Remove dirt, swirl marks, scratches and paint defects with the ergonomically designed Makita PV7000C. For an effective polishing, the tool comes with electronic control that provides consistent speed during operation. Adjust the speed of the tool to suit a wide range of polishing works using the variable speed control feature.

Application

-Put on a fresh coating of wax or take off an old one with this tool.

-Flatten or level the paint on the car body with the abrasive used in the tool.

-Apply polish paint on your car to maintain its sheen.

-Compounding old paint for applying fresh paint.
productAttributes.title: Makita PV7000C Vehicle Polisher 7 inch

productAttributes.productDescription:
Deterioration of the finish on your car is normal, and eventually the shine and shimmer starts fading away. However, you can retain it for a longer period of time with this vehicle polisher from Cumi Metabo. Ergonomically designed for convenient use, this tool will help you polish your car and do away with professional help.

The tool comes with a side handle and hand guard that allow a comfortable use and better control of the tool. You can adjust the speed of the Cumi Metabo PE 12-175 to suit the application or the material used, with the Vario Tacho Constamatic full wave electronics. The overload protection and electronic soft start features let users work on the tool in the most efficient manner.

Highly versatile, you can use the tool for maintaining the sheen of your automobile paints as well as for fine grinding and polishing stainless steel and stone surfaces. Keeping the tiles of your living room spick and span or making your car look brand new is all possible with this polisher.
productAttributes.title: Cumi Metabo PE 12-175 Vehicle Polisher 6.8 inch

It is equipped with straight and D-shaped handles for a better control during application.

-Apply or remove wax coatings.

-Grinding the surface layers to achieve smoothness.

-Removing old paint or varnish coatings.

-Polishing vehicles to maintain their shine.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Repairing broken furniture legs, attaching metal sheets on wooden walls or sealing wooden crates can be easily done with this nailer from Kaymo. Use this tool and do away with manual nailing that takes longer and requires more effort.

The Kaymo PRO-PB18G32 has an ergonomically designed handle with rubber grip for comfortable handling of the tool. This pneumatic nailer comes with a 360 degree adjustable exhaust with which you can direct the released air away from your body for a comfortable working.

Fixing upholstery to chairs, fixing boards on wooden posts or building wooden projects are easy with this tool.

productAttributes.productDescription: What is Paint Zoom? paint sprayer? Now you can paint like a pro with the Paint Zoom? paint sprayer and say goodbye to rollers, brushes and the mess of paint trays while getting the best coverage quickly and easily. Just pull the trigger and paint with your Paint Zoom? paint sprayer! The Paint Zoom? paint sprayer does the hard work for you?painting in just minutes instead of the hours you'd need with a brush and roller?with no drips or errors. Paint on any surface you want, both indoors and outdoors! With the Paint Zoom? paint sprayer, you can paint flat walls, stucco, brick, panelling, ceilings, concrete, wood and much more. And always get the professional finish you want while using 50% less paint and even more savings!. Why Paint Zoom? ? Paint Zoom? uses a lightweight, compressed air reservoir system. A paint cup is used to hold the paint, which is then drawn out using suction generated by compressed air that is driven from the hose to the paint gun nozzle. By fully developing the potential of the compressed air system, the Paint Zoom? sprayer has bridged the gap between professional-quality equipment and low-cost ease of use, making painting an easier, lower-cost job than ever before. To transform any room into a magnificent space, you don't need a whole range of Paint equipments. Just use the Paint Zoom? paint sprayer, to get that professional result in minutes! For general-purpose applications and home improvement projects, this system is the best paint sprayer. This compressed air sprayer machine uses precise viscosity and spray geometry control as well as volume flow control, which limits the use of the paint allow you to achieve professional-quality results without the professional cost. There are different sprayer types available in the market, including Power Paint sprayer, HVLP paint sprayer compressed air spraying and so on, which are all usually bulky and highly technical in design. But, the Paint Zoom? paint sprayer is made of ultra-light, ultra-durable material with simple mechanism, making it ideal for home use. Inside the portable power pack is an industrial-strength, 650-watt motor that delivers the power you need and when you need it. Simply pull the trigger and the paint gun pumps out an appropriate amount of paint to any surface. How to Use a Paint Zoom? paint Sprayer ? Read the accompanying user manual thoroughly before using the Paint Zoom? paint sprayer.
productAttributes.title: Telebuy Paintzoom PZ11 HVLP Sprayer Multicolor
Masanima PSG98 Air Assisted Sprayer

productAttributes.title: Black & Decker Pivoting Fast BDPR400 Paint Roller Pack of 1

productAttributes.productDescription: XGlide Roller : The Xglide Complete Paint System is the biggest breakthrough in painting technology...ever! The XGlide Roller is the only roller with the patented turn and lock system, allowing simultaneous painting of both the face and outside corners of all kinds of angled surfaces such as doorways, baseboards, furniture edges, etc.. Whether you are painting fences, banisters, furniture or a room, you will get it done faster without the mess of spatter and drips. No more wasted Paint! The dual roller heads with Tri-Lobal fibers or flock are designed to hold paint and only release it when you paint. This clean and efficient delivery means there is no waste and no dripping! Specificataion : - Paint 2X faster & easier. - Great for tight spaces. - Edge like a professional. - Do outside and inside corners. - No tapes or brushing required. - No drips or paint spatter.
productAttributes.title: Telebuy Xglide TBXGR1 Paint Roller Pack of 1

productAttributes.productDescription: Paint Pro : Always dreamt of changing the colour of your walls without making a huge project of it? Want to paint your house like a professional, but have no experience? Worry no more! Here comes PaintPro, the do-it-yourself home painting system which requires no compressor, no motor, no electricity and,? no experience! PaintPro is a scientifically designed, simple but very effective painting system for professionals as well as non-professional home users. The long-lasting industrial grade plastics, metal and foam used in the construction of the system gives lasting value for your money.
